title: Campus Coffee Card
description: Grab a specialty drink at Oakham Cafe or Balzac's on campus.

title: Lab Printing Credits
description: Extra $10 in print credits for the student computer labs.

title: Athletics Day Pass
description: One-day access to the RAC or MAC fitness centers.

title: Merch Voucher
description: Use towards hoodies, tees, or accessories at the campus store.

title: Guest Pass
description: Bring a friend to a club event or workshop this month.

title: Exam Survival Kit
description: Snacks, tea, and study essentials packed for finals week.
